response.original_title: How do I log into my TotalAV account? ❯ 855 • 535 • 4580 ❮
response.overview: ❯ 855 • 535 • 4580 ❮ Logging into your TotalAV account is a simple process, but many users face confusion if they forget where to sign in or cannot remember their credentials, so understanding the correct steps helps you access your dashboard quickly and manage your subscription, billing, and security features without delays. ❯ 855 • 535 • 4580 ❮ To begin, open your preferred web browser and go to the official TotalAV website, then locate the Log In or My Account option usually found at the top-right corner of the homepage, which directs you to the secure sign-in page. ❯ 855 • 535 • 4580 ❮ On the login screen, enter the email address you used when purchasing or registering your TotalAV subscription, as this email is the primary identifier for your account and is required to load your subscription details correctly.
response.title: How do I log into my TotalAV account? ❯ 855 • 535 • 4580 ❮
